author: Staff Reporter
text:
Election officials on Thursday seized unaccounted money of Rs. 2.5 lakh from a private company official here.

During vehicle check at the toll gate, officials intercepted a car from Bengaluru and found Rs. 2.5 cash without documents. Sivadas Ramanadan (41) from Bengaluru said that he was on his way to Kerala to complete a land registration. Since he could not produce any documents, the officials seized the money.

In Dharmapuri, officials seized Rs. 1.2 lakh from a trader on Koot Road. During vehicle check, they found the cash.

The trader said that he was on his way to purchase in the market. Since, he was not in possession of documents, the officials seized the money.
title: Rs. 2.5 lakh seized
